properties.entry: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , CREATED_AT FROM CUSTOMER WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N'
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , CREATED_AT FROM CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = ? AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , CREATED_AT FROM CUSTOMER WHERE EMAIL = ? AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , CREATED_AT FROM CUSTOMER WHERE NAME = ? AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
UPDATE CUSTOMER SET PHONE = ? WHERE NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ?
UPDATE CUSTOMER SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE EMAIL = ?
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , CREATED_AT FROM CUSTOMER WHERE EMAIL = ? AND PHONE = ? AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
